contentrichtext.text: {{BLP sources|date=October 2010}} {{Infobox person | name = Yōko Honna | image = | alt = | caption = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1979|01|07}} | birth_place = | death_date = <!-- {{Death date and age|YYYY|MM|DD|YYYY|MM|DD}} (death date then birth date) --> | death_place = | nationality = Japanese | other_names = | known_for = | occupation = [[seiyū|Voice actress]] }} {{nihongo|'''Yōko Honna'''|本名 陽子|Honna Yōko|born January 7, 1979}} is a Japanese [[seiyū|voice actress]] from [[Sōka, Saitama]]. She works at [[Re-Max]], although she formerly worked at [[81 Produce]]. ==Filmography== ===Anime=== * ''[[Only Yesterday (1991 film)|Only Yesterday]]'' (1991 film), '''Taeko Okajima''' (5th grade) * ''[[Whisper of the Heart (film)|Whisper of the Heart]]'' (1995 film), '''Shizuku Tsukishima''', Theme Song Performance * ''[[The Cat Returns]]'' (2002 film), Chika * ''[[Futari wa Pretty Cure]]'' (2004 TV series), '''Nagisa Misumi/Cure Black''' * ''[[Agatha Christie no Meitantei Poirot to Marple]]'' (2004 TV series), Jane Grey (ep 36-39) * ''[[Ninja Nonsense]]'' (2004 TV series) (ep 7, 8, 12) * ''[[Rockman.EXE Stream]]'' (2004 TV series), Maid D (ep 37) * ''[[Gunbuster 2]]'' (2004 [[Original video animation|OVA]] series), Nyan Nok Cham * ''[[Futari wa Pretty Cure Max Heart]]'' (2005 TV series), '''Nagisa Misumi/Cure Black''' * ''[[Emma: A Victorian Romance]]'' (2005 TV series), Sarah * ''[[Glass Mask]]''(2005 TV 2005), '''Mina Sawatari''', Troupe leader (ep 31) * ''[[Futakoi Alternative]]'' (2005 TV series) (ep 8, 9) * ''[[Futari wa Pretty Cure: Max Heart]]'' (2005 film), '''Nagisa Misumi/Cure Black ''' * ''[[Tide-Line Blue]]'' (2005 TV series), Chenresi * ''[[To Heart 2#Anime|To Heart 2]]'' (2005 TV series), Freshman A (ep 3) * ''[[Cluster Edge]]'' (2005 TV series), Lina * ''[[Futari wa Precure Max Heart 2: Yukizora no Tomodachi]]'' (2005 film), '''Nagisa Misumi/Cure Black''' * ''[[Ray the Animation|Ray]]'' (2006 TV series), Misato * ''[[.hack//Roots]]'' (2006 TV series), Asta<ref>Yuki, Masahiro. "The Official Art of .hack//Roots". (May 2007) ''Newtype USA''. pp. 101-107.</ref> * ''[[xxxHOLiC]]'' (2006 TV series), Rin (ep 2) * ''[[Koi suru Tenshi Angelique: Kokoro no Mezameru Toki]]'' (2006 TV series), '''Ange''' * ''[[Koi suru Tenshi Angelique: Kagayaki no Ashita]]'' (2007 TV series), '''Ange''' * ''[[Sakura Wars|Sakura Taisen: New York NY.]]'' (2007 OVA series), '''Yoshino Anri''' * ''[[Emma: A Victorian Romance Second Act]]'' (2007 TV series), Annie * ''[[Mobile Suit Gundam 00]]'' (2007 TV series), '''Sumeragi Lee Noriega''' * ''Noramimi'' (2008 TV series), Merry (ep 11) * ''[[Mobile Suit Gundam 00 Second Season]]'' (2008 TV series), '''Sumeragi Lee Noriega''' * ''[[Precure All Stars DX: Minna Tomodachi— Kiseki no Zenin Daishūgō]]'' (2009 film), '''Nagisa Misumi/Cure Black''' * ''[[Hanamaru Kindergarten]]'' (2010 TV series), '''Sakura''' * ''[[Mobile Suit Gundam 00 the Movie: Awakening of the Trailblazer|Mobile Suit Gundam 00 The Movie: A wakening of the Trailblazer]]'' (2010 film), '''Sumeragi Lee Noriega''' * ''[[Highschool of the Dead]]'' (2010 TV Series), Kyoko Hayashi * ''[[Karneval (manga)|Karneval]]'' (2013 TV Series), Eva ===Drama CD=== * ''[[Karneval]]'' (2010 Drama CD), Eva ===Video games=== * [[Panzer Dragoon Orta]] (2002), Orta * [[Tatsunoko vs. Capcom: Cross Generation of Heroes]]'/[[Tatsunoko vs. Capcom: Ultimate All-Stars]] (2008/2010), Saki Omokane (Wii Exclusive Character) * [[Tales of Symphonia: Dawn of the New World]] (2008/2009), Aqua * [[2nd Super Robot Wars Z]] (2011-2012) Sumeragi Lee Noriega * [[Super Robot Wars UX]] (2013) Sumeragi Lee Noriega ===Dub roles=== ====Film==== * ''[[The Amazing Spider-Man (2012 film)|The Amazing Spider-Man]]'', '''[[Gwen Stacy]]''' ([[Emma Stone]]) * ''[[The Iron Lady (film)|The Iron Lady]]'' - young [[Margaret Thatcher]] ([[Alexandra Roach]]) * ''[[Shaolin (film)|Shaolin]]'' - Yan Xi ([[Fan Bingbing]]) * ''[[Watchmen (film)|Watchmen]]'' - '''Silk Specter II''' ([[Malin Åkerman]]) ====TV Drama==== * ''[[90210 (TV series)|90210]]'' ('''Annie Wilson''' ([[Shenae Grimes]])) ====TV Animation==== * ''[[Atomic Betty]]'' - '''Atomic Betty/Betty Barrett''' * ''[[Super Robot Monkey Team Hyperforce Go!]]'' - Nova * ''[[Yin Yang Yo!]]'' - ''Yang'' * ''[[Jackie Chan Adventures]] - ''Jade Chan'' ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.honna-yoko.com/index.html Official website] * {{ann|people|21164}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Honna Yoko | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese voice actor | DATE OF BIRTH = 1979 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Honna Yoko}} [[Category:1979 births]] [[Category:Japanese voice actresses]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Saitama Prefecture]] {{Japan-voice-actor-stub}}
